transArray.content: The location of the hotel is superior and the transportation is convenient, but it will not be noisy. The high-speed rail station and the subway station are just a few minutes away. The hotel has complete facilities, the rooms are clean and tidy, the area is large, the view from the window is also very good, and the stay is very comfortable. The service from Xiao Yang at the front desk is very good. He is very proactive and enthusiastic. The breakfast delivered is great and considerate. The auntie in the guest room is also very nice and considerate. In short, I am very satisfied with the experience of staying here. Like it
